arrangements 1.1.3

    • Benchmarking 'arrangements'

    Benchmarking ‘arrangements’

    benchmark.Rmd

    The goal of this document is to compare the performances of some of the existing packages for generating combinations, permutations and partitions.

    • gtools 3.8.1
    • combinat 0.0-8
    • multicool 0.1-10
    • partitions 1.9-19
    • permute 0.9-4
    • permutations 1.0-2
    • RcppAlgos 2.0.3
    • iterpc: it is omitted as arrangements is thought of a replacement of iterpc.
    library(microbenchmark)
library(gtools)
library(combinat)
library(multicool)
library(partitions)
library(permute)
library(permutations)
library(RcppAlgos)
library(arrangements)
gtools.permutations <- gtools::permutations
gtools.combinations <- gtools::combinations
utils.combn <- utils::combn

    gtools::permutations, gtools::combinations and utils::combn are renamed because they are being overwritten by arrangements::permutations, arrangements::combinations and combinat::combn respectively.

    Permutations

    Permutations of 6 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(6, 6),
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(1:6)),
    partitions = partitions::perms(6),
    permuate = allPerms(6),
    permutations = allperms(6),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(6, 6),
    arrangements = permutations(6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##        gtools  697.52  384.29  372.33  355.71  345.13  322.81   100
##     multicool  342.93  193.14  195.89  200.73  186.49  201.16   100
##    partitions    3.29    2.97    3.09    2.90    2.89    4.01   100
##      permuate 1231.46  682.35  689.52  658.37  620.99 1541.51   100
##  permutations 3461.38 2015.85 1830.69 1895.50 1644.68 1292.58   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.53    1.76    2.06    1.84    1.83   15.03   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   100

    5-Permutations of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 5),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 5),
    arrangements = permutations(7, 5),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 290.69 265.77 230.18 224.31 233.13 139.07   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.33   1.62   1.52   1.52   1.59   1.12   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   100

    Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 2547.02 2534.60 1784.44 2127.56 1638.97 1021.30   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.38    1.37    1.38    1.49    1.45    1.37   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   100

    K-Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 3903.42 3883.99 2906.05 3104.14 3007.37 372.033   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.43    1.43    1.55    1.54    1.53   0.992   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   1.000   100

    Combinations

    7-Combinations of 15 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(15, 7),
    combinat = combn(15, 7),
    utils = utils.combn(15, 7),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(15, 7),
    arrangements = combinations(15, 7),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq  mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 381.28 360.45 326.5 360.77 363.42 186.18   100
##      combinat  98.20  87.47  84.4  87.05  95.99  62.10   100
##         utils 124.37 109.97 107.1 109.98 122.37  96.49   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.05   1.16   1.2   1.15   1.31   1.44   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.0   1.00   1.00   1.00   100

    Combinations with replacement of 9 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(9, 6, repeats.allowed = TRUE),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(9, 6, repetition = TRUE),
    arrangements = combinations(9, 6, replace = TRUE),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 325.80 305.51 295.32 272.27 284.16 786.50   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.09   1.15   1.25   1.25   1.32   1.58   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   100

    Combinations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:8, f)
microbenchmark(
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(8, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = combinations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##     RcppAlgos 1.49 1.49 1.48   1.54 1.38 1.77   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.00   100

    Partitions

    Partitions of 30

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = parts(30),
    arrangements = partitions(30),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.31 2.91 3.29    2.9 2.72 10.5   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00    1.0 1.00  1.0   100

    Partitions of 50 into 10 parts

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = restrictedparts(50, 10, include.zero = FALSE),
    arrangements = partitions(50, 10),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##    partitions 4.08 3.81 3.39   3.91 3.92 1.05   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.00   100
